<a id="ResourceImporterImage"></a>

# ResourceImporterImage

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](ResourceImporter.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Imports an image for use in scripting, with no rendering capabilities.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This importer imports [Image](Image.md) resources, as opposed to [CompressedTexture2D](CompressedTexture2D.md). If you need to render the image in 2D or 3D, use [ResourceImporterTexture](ResourceImporterTexture.md) instead.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Importing images](../tutorials/assets_pipeline/importing_images.md)
